name: Pong Day
description:
Pong Day

Games such as table tennis, can be played by two people or with CPU and have a low level to difficult and to play with friends or patners, happy playing.

Control: 

Player 1= W: Up, A: Left, D: Right S: Down, PowerUp:  D

Player 2= Up, Left, Right, and  Down directional button, PowerUp: Arrow Right

Esc: Pause, F1: Menu, Enter: Restart Game, F2: Menu
